src:
Spisak Engleza: Vratili se Oks i Hadson Odoi, izvisio Griliš, „ubila“ ga konkurencija
Timu Gareta Sautgejta potreban samo bod za EURO

07 Nov 2019

Tek jedna utakmica u dresu reprezenatcije za godinu i po dana, ali Aleks Okslejd Čembrlejn toliko je napredovao od povratka u sastav Liverpula da Geret Sautgejt nije mogao da ga ignoriše. Posledica je poziv 26-godišnjem vezisti za završni ciklus kvalifikacija za Prvenstvo Evrope i mečeve sa Crnom Gorom i Kosovom, gde će Gordi albion tražiti jedan bod za plasman na završni turnir.
Oks je dugo kuburio sa povredama od dolaska na Enfild. Najpre su mu stradali prednji ukršteni ligamenti kolena, onda i zadnja loža, ali je ove sezone izuzetno koristan za ekipu Jirgena Klopa, davao je golove Genku u Ligi šampiona, bio strelac i asistent u čudesnom preokretu protiv bivšeg kluba, Arsenala, u Liga kupu, logično što je dobio poverenje selektora.„Nismo ga nagradili, nego stvarno verujemo u njega. Zato smo ga i vratili u reprezentaciju, tokom oktobra sam mu poslao poruku da verujem u njega i da je potrebno samo da nastavi da igra standardno“, obrazložio je odluku Garet Sautgejt.
Od ostalih promena, bitno je što se pod zastavu vratio još jedan vezista, Kalum Hadson Odoi. I fudbaler Čelsija dugo je odsustvovao zbog povrede (Ahilova tetiva), ali je najpre u septembru izborio mesto u ekipi Plavaca, sad i u državnom timu.
Od ostalih zanimljivosti vredi istaći da Džeku Grilišu nije bilo dovoljno što je zaslužan za osam pogodaka Aston Vile od povratka u Premijer ligu, ali da ga je „ubila“ konkurencija.„Reč je o veoma dobrom igraču, pažljivo smo ga pratili, međutim, realnost je da na njegovim pozicijama imamo Sterlinga, Rašforda, Hadson Odoija i Sanča. Znam da može da igra i kao „osmica“, ali u poslednje vreme, dok je klub iz Birmingema beležio dobre rezultate, nije bio na tom mestu. Radio sam s njim u mladoj selekciji, mogu da kažem da je vrlo blizu prvog tima“, dodao je Sautgejt.
Zanimljivo je da se u tim vratio i organizator igre Lestera, Džejms Medison, pošto je propusito gostovanja u Pragu i Sofiji.
Engleska 14. novembra čeka Crnu Goru, a tri dana kasnije gostuje u Prištini.

SPISAK REPREZENTACIJE ENGLESKE

Golmani: Tom Hiton (Aston Vila), Džordan Pikford (Everton), Nick Poupe (Barnli)MDefanzivci: Trent Aleksander Arnold (Liverpul), Ben Čilvel (Lester), Džo Gomez (Liverpul), Hari Magvajer (Mančester junajte), Tajron Mings (Aston Vila), Deni Rouz (Totenhem), Džon Stouns (Mančester Siti), Fikajo Tomori (Čelsi), Kiran Tripije (Atletiko Madrid);Vezisti: Ros Barkli (Čelsi), Fabijan Delf (Everton), Džordan Henderson (Liverpul), Džejms Madison (Lester), Mejson Maunt (ČelsI), Aleks Okslejd Čembrlejn (Liverpul), Diklan Rajs (Vest Hem), Hari Vinks (Totenhem);Napadači: Tami Ejbraham (Čelsi), Kalum Hadson Odoi (Čelsi), Hari Kejn (Totenhem), Marksu Rašford (Mančester junajted), Džejdon Sančo (Borusija Dortmund), Rahim Sterling (Mančester Siti) i Kalum Vilson (Bournmut).


Pogledajte novu epizodu serije Ekipizza...
text:
List of Englishmen: Ox and Hudson Odoi returned, reported by Grillish, "killed" by competition
Garrett Southgate's team only needs a point for EURO

07 Nov 2019

Only one match in the national team jersey in a year and a half, but Alex Oxlade Chamberlain has progressed so much since returning to Liverpool that Greta Southgate could not ignore him. The result is a call to the 26-year-old midfielder for the final round of qualifying for the European Championships and matches with Montenegro and Kosovo, where Gordon Albion will claim one point to qualify for the final tournament.
Ox has long been coughed up with injuries since coming to Enfield. He suffered first anterior cruciate ligaments, then a posterior lobe, but this season he is extremely useful for Jirgen Klop's team, giving goals to Genk in the Champions League, being a scorer and an assistant in a miraculous turnaround against the former club, Arsenal, in the League Cup. logical that he got the confidence of the selectors. "We didn't reward him, but we really believe in him. That's why we brought him back to the national team, in October I sent him a message that I believed in him and that he only needed to continue playing standard, "explained Garrett Southgate's decision.
Of other changes, it is important that another midfielder, Kalum Hudson Odoi, returns under the banner. The Chelsea footballer has also been away for a long time due to an injury (Achilles tendon), but first in September he won a spot on the Plavac team, now on the national team.
Among other interesting things, it is worth noting that Jack Grillish did not have enough credit for eight Aston Villa goals since returning to the Premier League, but that he was "killed" by the competition. "He is a very good player, we have been watching him closely, however, the reality is is that we have Sterling, Rushford, Hudson Odoi and Sancho in his positions. I know he can also play as an eight, but lately, while the Birmingham club has been performing well, it has not been in that place. I worked with him in the young selection, I can say that he is very close to the first team, "Southgate added.
Interestingly, the organizer of the game of Leicester, James Madison, has returned, as he missed out on visits to Prague and Sofia.
England is waiting for Montenegro on November 14, and is visiting Pristina three days later.

ENGLISH REPRESENTATION LIST

Goalkeepers: Tom Hiton (Aston Villa), Jordan Pickford (Everton), Nick Poupe (Burnley) MD Defenders: Trent Alexander Arnold (Liverpool), Ben Chillwell (Leicester), Joe Gomez (Liverpool), Harry Magweyer (Manchester United), Tyrone Mings (Aston Villa), Danny Rose (Tottenham), John Stones (Manchester City), Ficayo Tomory (Chelsea), Kieran Thurkey (Atletico Madrid); Midfielders: Ross Barkley (Chelsea), Fabian Delph (Everton), Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) , James Madison (Leicester), Mason Mount (Chelsea), Alex Oxlade Chamberlain (Liverpool), Dylan Rice (West Ham), Harry Winks (Tottenham); Forwards: Tami Abraham (Chelsea), Callum Hudson Odoi (Chelsea), Harry Kane (Tottenham), Marx Rushford (Manchester United), Jadon Sancho (Borussia Dortmund), Rahim Sterling (Manchester City) and Callum Wilson (Bournmut).
